amendment.description: An amendment to increase Construction, Army Corps of Engineers by $2,241,850 and reduce Departmental Administration, Department of Energy by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: Amendment allocates an additional $2.2 million to the Army Corps of Engineers account for the Army Corps' shore protection mission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rice (SC) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Rice (SC).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rice (SC) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
